amendment.description: Amendment deletes $20 million appropriated for the Gas Turbine-Modular Helium Reactor program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 7 in the Congressional Record of June 22, to eliminate all funding for the Gas Turbine-Modular Helium Reactor program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 306 - 121 (Roll no. 485).
